name: GigaKubica Racing
description:
GigaKubica Racing is a game I made on my own for PolskiGamedev Game Jam.

It's a top-down arcade endless runner racing game where you race against the clock and try to beat your high score on procedurally generated tracks.

It's also a funny (well, at least I tried!) tribute to my favorite racing driver Robert Kubica.

Assets used:
* Kenney RoadKit *original F1 theme shittyflute
